page.title: 10LAW AND ORDER
page.content:
THE CRIME RATE IN THESE 4 AREAS IS INCREASING EVERY DAY.IT IS GETTING TO THE STAGE WHERE THE CRIMINALS DO NOT EVEN WAIT TILL DARK TO COMMIT THEIR CRIMES.IF THE CRIMINALS DO GET CAUGHT THEY EITHER GET A LIGHT FINE OR A SHORT JAIL SENTENCE.SO WHEN THEY GET OUT THEY JUST START AGAIN. MOST PEOPLE THINK "OH IT WILL NEVER HAPPEN TO ME".SO DO NOT BOTHER COMPLAINING TO THE POLICE FORCE. DRUMCHAPEL IS THE AREA WHERE CRIME IS MORE SERIOUS WHEREAS IN BEARSDEN THE CRIME RATE IS NOT AS HIGH.
MORE POLICEMEN ARE NOW "ON THE BEAT" BUT THERE ARE NOT ENOUGH TO COMBAT THE RISING TIDE OF CRIMINAL ACTIVITY.
ONE AREA OF DRUMCHAPEL IS A VIRTUAL "NO-GO" AREA FOR THE POLICE.
